Text: The For Carnation:  To date they have released two EP and one [self-titled] album: "Fight Songs" (Matador Records, 1995), "Marshmallows" (Matador, 1996), and "The For Carnation" (Touch and Go Records, 2000).
Triplets:<The For Carnation
4:
--------------------
<Text: The For Carnation:  Fight Songs and Marshmallows were compiled into one record, "Promised Works", and released by Runt in 1997.>
